channel.title: Expressjs on KrolTech
channel.description: Recent content in Expressjs on KrolTech

item.title: Boilerplate web app using Backbone.js, ExpressJS, node.js, MongoDB
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: A boilerplate project for a complete web application written using Backbone.js & Marionette, node.js & ExpressJS, MongoDB & Mongoose, Handlebars, Grunt.js, Bower, and Browserify!

item.title: Starting Web Development with node.js/ExpressJS
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: For the past few months I’ve been seeing more and more about node.js popping up all over the place. I installed it and dabbled a few months ago, but never really spent more than an hour and honestly didn’t walk away very impressed (my own fault, really). This past week I decided to really give it another shot, really trying to dig into it and actually accomplish something. This also sparked by my discovery of Koding.
